name: Quadrax
overview: In the deep desert of Sahara stand the mysterious Temple of Sun. It's been said, that noone whose gone inside returned to home. Elder legends said, that in the highest floor of the temple lives the Godess of Sun. Your quest is to find your way through all rooms and reach the top of the temple. In every room there is one exit and sometimes many mysteries to solve. You will only get into the next room when both heroes reached the exit safely. Switches to use and elevators will help you. You will also discover many other usefull or dangerous things.
